alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:37PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A line of heavy showers and possible thunderstorms will impact portions of the Portland and Vancouver Metro through 615 PM PDT... At 534 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers and possible thunderstorms along a line extending from Salmon Creek to Beaverton to near Forest Grove. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and brief heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Areas with poor drainage may experience local ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Oregon City, Washougal, Vancouver Downtown, Portland Downtown, Portland, Vancouver, Gresham, Beaverton, Tigard, Lake Oswego, Tualatin, West Linn, Milwaukie, Wilsonville, Camas, Troutdale, Gladstone, Maywood Park and Rivergrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area
